text: Kodi iye amene amamvera Mulungu ndipo amadzipereka m’mapemphero nthawi ya usiku ndi kugwada kapena kuimirira popembedza ndiponso amene amaopa za m’moyo umene uli nkudza ndipo amalakalaka chisomo cha Ambuye wake ndi wofanana ndi osakhulupirira? Nena, “Kodi iwo amene amadziwa ndi ofanana ndi iwo osadziwa?” Ndi okhawo amene ndi ozindikira amene adzakumbukira
